mapper.insert: insert into PAFund.qsq.sys_user ( area_id, office_id, login_name, password, name, email, phone, mobile, remarks, userType, del_flag, login_ip, login_date, create_by, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at ) values (#{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{officeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GETDATE(), #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into sys_user
id,
area_id,
office_id,
login_name,
password,
name,
email,
phone,
mobile,
remarks,
userType,
del_flag,
login_ip,
login_date,
create_by,
created_at,
updated_at,
deleted_at,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{officeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{usertype,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{loginIp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: SELECT id,area_id,office_id,login_name,password ,name,email,phone,mobile,remarks,userType,del_flag ,login_ip,login_date,create_by,created_at,updated_at,deleted_at FROM PAFund.qsq.sys_user WHERE login_name=#{username} and password = #{password}

SELECT id,area_id,office_id,login_name,password ,name,email,phone,mobile,remarks,userType,del_flag ,login_ip,login_date,create_by,created_at,updated_at,deleted_at FROM PAFund.qsq.sys_user WHERE email=#{email}
